hero.name: Austin Jose
hero.headline: Every Millisecond Matters
hero.title: Associate Software Engineer | Delivering Production-grade, Performance-driven Systems @Zolvit (formerly Vakilsearch)

about.summary: Full-stack Software Engineer with production experience building high-performance, scalable web applications using Next.js and Node.js. Focused on frontend performance, backend reliability, SEO, and real-world user impact.

points: Owned end-to-end development of high-traffic Next.js applications, selecting SSR, SSG, or ISR based on SEO needs, data freshness, and backend response behavior.
Improved Core Web Vitals by optimizing JavaScript execution, caching strategies, asset delivery, and third-party scripts, driving measurable gains in search impressions.
Built CMS-driven pages integrated with backend APIs, standardizing data contracts and reducing content release cycles by enabling non-engineers to ship updates safely.
Developed responsive React and Next.js components for onboarding and service discovery flows, ensuring accessibility, consistency, and maintainability across shared production codebases.
Integrated REST APIs, fixed UI and data handling issues, and supported incremental performance improvements under real production constraints and user traffic.
Used Storybook to develop reusable UI components, improving onboarding efficiency and collaboration between frontend, backend, and design teams.

projects.title: Lawyers Listing & Public Q&A Platform
points: Developed a server-rendered Q&A platform optimized for discoverability and performance, handling large datasets through efficient pagination and secure server-side data processing.
Designed backend flows using Hapi.js, Elasticsearch, and JWT-based authentication for posts, moderation, and fast search, maintaining approximately 99 percent application uptime.

projects.title: CMS-Based Legal Services Platform
points: Built SEO-critical service and onboarding pages using Next.js SSR, balancing server performance, page discoverability, and user experience across high-intent customer flows.
Implemented CMS-driven layouts backed by APIs, removing engineering dependency for content updates while enforcing validation, security checks, and structured data delivery.

projects.title: Video Consultation Web Application
points: Designed and developed a full-stack system enabling real-time legal consultations after authentication and payment, supporting video, audio, and messaging communication flows.
Implemented WebRTC for media streaming and WebSockets for signaling and chat, ensuring low-latency communication and stable session management.

impact: Reduced over 3,000 underperforming pages to zero in Google Search Console through combined server-side rendering, frontend performance optimizations, and backend-driven data delivery improvements.
Increased search impressions by 8 percent within ten days by improving Core Web Vitals, optimizing caching strategies, and stabilizing server- and statically-rendered pages.
